CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: MOT kneels down on floor and looks at CHI
<aft> MOT turns the handle of the jack+in+the+box
MOT draws the book closer to her
INV moves away and out of room shutting door behind her
MOT picks up book and opens it
CHI looks at door as INV leaves
MOT turns pages of the book
CHI continues to look at door
MOT raises the book and displays it closer to CHI
CHI turns quickly toward door . CHI turns and looks at MOT
a closing door is heard in the hall
MOT puts book down and looks at CHI
MOT brushes back CHI's hair with her hand
MOT motions for CHI to come towards her
CHI turns and looks at MOT
MOT draws CHI near and hugs her . MOT pats CHI on the back
MOT looks at objects on floor
MOT squeezes doll which makes noise
<bef> MOT picks up book and show CHI picture
MOT turns the handle on the jack+in+the+box
CHI looks down at the toy
MOT pulls jack+in+the+box toward her and holds up the clown
MOT holds clown back then stuffs the clown back into the box . MOT turns the handle until the tune is about complete then stops
<aft> MOT picks up the book and opens it up
MOT draws book closer to her
MOT points to picture in book
MOT looks at CHI and taps picture with her thumb as she holds the book open
CHI's profile is partially blocked as MOT is sitting between the camera and CHI
MOT continues to look at CHI
<bef> MOT wipes tears out of CHI eyes
MOT turns around and looks at camera
MOT turns sideways so that her back is not facing the camera and she is not blocking the view of the CHI
<aft> MOT turns a page of the book
CHI scans the room then looks at book
MOT gets a toy truck out of a case and puts it on the floor in front of CHI
MOT looks at objects which are out of camera's view
MOT rolls truck on the floor in front of CHI
MOT looks at truck then at CHI
MOT leafs through the pages of a book
MOT continues to turn the pages of the book
MOT continues to look at book
MOT turns a page of the book
CHI stands near MOT with one finger in her mouth and the other hand twirling her hair behind her head . CHI looks at book
<$=1> MOT taps page with her finger . <3> MOT looks at CHI
MOT looks at book then at CHI
CHI moves closer to MOT and book
MOT points to picture and continues to look at book
CHI reaches out hand toward object on floor
CHI looks at object on floor
CHI squeezes the toy and it squeaks
<bef> CHI squeezes duck and it squeaks
CHI squeezes duck and it squeaks
CHI looks at duck then at MOT
MOT reaches over and squeezes the toy causing it to squeak
CHI continues to look at duck
CHI stands on her toes briefly and wiggles her arms
CHI turns duck around in her hands
MOT touches CHI clothing around her neck
CHI looks at MOT . CHI looks at duck in her hand
MOT looks at duck then at CHI
CHI continues to looks at duck
CHI turns duck in her hand
noise comes from ceiling of room
MOT looks up at the ceiling . MOT looks at CHI
CHI looks up at the ceiling
MOT brushes hair away from CHI's eyes with her hand
CHI looks down at duck in her hands
MOT looks at toy CHI is holding in hands
MOT looks at duck then at CHI
MOT continues to look at duck
CHI squeezes duck . CHI shakes toy duck up and down producing a lot of squeaky sounds
CHI squeezes duck . CHI throws duck on the floor
MOT watches duck sail across room . MOT looks at CHI
CHI raises both hands above his head then puts them down
CHI looks around then looks toward door
MOT looks at CHI then at book
CHI looks down at toys on the floor
CHI reaches down and picks up the jack+in+the+box and carries it over to MOT
MOT accepts jack+in+the+box from CHI and holds it on her lap
CHI turns the crank of the jack+in+the+box until the clown pops out
MOT looks from toy to CHI back to toy
<bef> CHI is slightly startled . CHI examines at clown
CHI continues to touch clowns head and face
<2> MOT elongates first part of word
CHI tries to push clown into box
<aft> MOT adjusts box on her lap
CHI lets go of jack+in+the+box and backs away .
MOT begins to put clown back into box
CHI raises her arms up and down repeatedly
CHI looks away and down toward floor
CHI may be frustrated at being interrupted
<$=4> MOT continues to look down at box
<aft> MOT turns the handle of jack+in+the+box once
CHI turns and looks at jack+in+the+box
MOT puts the jack+in+the+box on the floor
looks at jack+in+the+box and sits next to MOT
<1-3> MOT puts jack+in+the+box closer to CHI
CHI picks up jack+in+the+box and puts it in between her legs
CHI turns the handle of jack+in+the+box
CHI looks up as MOT readjusts her position on the floor . CHI looks at jack+in+the+box
MOT moves slightly away from CHI . MOT watches CHI
MOT steadies the box with her hand
CHI looks around as if she heard something . CHI looks down at jack+in+the+box
MOT removes her hand from the box as CHI steadies it with her own hand . MOT watches CHI
INV talks with MOT and explains next activity
INV puts object on table and sets it in motion
MOT leans in closer to CHI
MOT brushes CHI's hair back away from her forehead
CHI is grasping a toy from the Small Scale Activity
MOT reaches toward the object in CHI's hand
CHI continues to stare at object
CHI continues to stare at object
INV explains PCI boxes to MOT
CHI bounces up and down on her toes
CHI turns and walks a few steps
MOT sits back on her knees
MOT extends the ball toward CHI
<aft> MOT tosses the ball to CHI
CHI turns around in a circle
MOT tosses the ball up and catches it
CHI walks toward MOT . CHI takes ball from MOTs hand
CHI raises her arms above her head . CHI looks at ball
CHI walks toward chair near the table
CHI puts one hand on the back of the chair while holding ball with the other hand
MOT grabs back of chair then steadies it
as CHI leans on chair it begins to fall backward
CHI begins to fall over chair
MOT adjusts bumper on back of chair
CHI raises ball with both hands over her head
MOT looks at CHI and extends her arms
MOT turns to the side and bounces ball and catches it
CHI backs up and looks toward table . CHI walks toward table
CHI turns and takes ball with two hands
CHI walks to the table and puts the ball on the table
MOT shakes her head and looks at CHI
MOT leans forward and places her hand on the floor . MOT looks at the floor
MOT sits straight up and looks at CHI
MOT moves chair under the table
MOT pats the floor with her hand
CHI tosses ball on the floor
MOT bends forward to retrieve ball
CHI raises her arms over her head and walks in front of MOT toward the trash can
MOT bounces ball and catches it
CHI turns and walks towards MOT
MOT gently tosses the ball into CHI's hands
CHI turns slightly and looks at ball . CHI looks at MOT
MOT turns palms up and out getting ready to catch ball
CHI tosses ball into MOTs arms
MOT looks at CHI and shakes her head back and forth
CHI raises her arms above her head and walks toward chair

<3-4> MOT points to bears on back of chair
MOT tosses ball up and catches it

<aft> CHI takes ball from MOT and begins to walk with it
MOT opens her arms with palms turned up
CHI slowly bends down with ball in hand
MOT slowly bends down imitating CHI
CHI stands up and walks toward MOT with ball raised above her head . CHI pauses briefly then throws ball into MOTs lap
CHI raises her arms above her head and then takes a few steps away from MOT
MOT stands up on her knees and turns toward the desk
MOTs back is visible on camera
CHI turns and looks at MOT
CHI stands with ball in her arms
MOT moves the boxes around on the desk top
MOT points to the ball near the door
CHI walks over to the ball
CHI bends down and picks up ball . CHI turns toward MOT
CHI walks to MOT with the ball
MOT opens a box and looks inside
<bef> MOT takes blanket out of box . MOT puts folded blanket in front of her face
MOT is standing between camera and CHI
MOT sits back on her knees
MOT puts blanket over her face
<bef> MOT lowers blanket from her face
CHI looks at desk . CHI looks at MOT
CHI reaches toward desk and looks at MOT
MOT stands on her knees and looks at desk top
CHI is not visible on camera . MOT is between CHI and camera
MOT puts blanket over CHI's head
MOT sits back on her knees
<aft> MOT stands on her knees with the folded blanket and looks at box
MOT puts the blanket in the box
CHI stands by the chair and watches MOT
MOT opens box and brings it closer to her
MOT is still kneeling at the desk with her back to the camera
CHI raises her arms up as she tries to watch MOT
MOT takes a sheet of paper out of box
MOT turns and looks toward center of floor
MOT puts the paper on floor
<bef> MOT takes a crayon out of the box . MOT offers crayon to CHI
CHI walks toward box with outstretched arms . CHI takes crayon into both hands
MOT takes crayon out of box then puts box on desk
MOT looks at box and at desk
CHI reaches up for box then watches MOT
<aft> MOT leans forward closer to the paper
MOT looks at paper on floor
<bef> MOT puts her crayon on the paper
CHI bends over and puts her hands on the paper
CHI lies down on her stomach
CHI holds crayon in her fist and inadvertently makes mark on paper as she moves to lie down
MOT quickly points to the mark on the paper
MOT leans in closer toward CHI and paper on floor
<bef> CHI puts crayon in her right hand . CHI scribbles on the paper
<1> MOT makes two brief marks on the paper
MOT places the crayon on the paper in front of CHI
CHI makes mark on paper with orange crayon
CHI stops drawing then offers crayon to MOT
CHI looks at crayon then at paper . CHI looks at MOT
CHI lifts up the top sheet of paper from the top and places it off to the side of the stack of papers
MOT makes a mark on the paper
CHI looks at paper . CHI lifts paper and offers it to MOT
<aft> MOT makes marks on the paper
MOT looks down at the paper
CHI lifts up another piece of paper
CHI picks up two sheets of paper on floor . CHI separates the sheets of paper . CHI offers one piece to MOT
MOT takes paper from CHI and places it in front of her
MOT sits up straight and looks down at the floor
<aft> MOT leans forward and puts crayon on paper
CHI looks at the paper in her hands
CHI offers MOT a piece of paper
CHI looks at paper between her legs
MOT looks at CHI . MOT sits up straight
CHI takes paper from her legs and places it on the floor

<aft> CHI starts to draw on the paper

MOT begins to mark on paper

MOT writes the letters as she speaks them
MOT leans back and watches CHI
CHI sits up and looks at the piece of paper in her hands
